item.title: Box Office: James Gunn’s ‘Superman’ Flying to $55M Friday for $115M-$120M U.S. Opening
item.description: The movie — launching a new era for DC Studios — will be only the third Hollywood pic of the year so far to cross the century mark in its domestic box office debut.

item.title: Box Office: James Gunn’s ‘Superman’ Soars to $22.5 Million in Previews
item.description: The movie — launching a new era for DC Studios — scored the top preview gross of the year to date.
